website_summaries.verdict: The Propet Connelly was lauded for the comfort it provided to consumers. The testers were pleased that it was stylish and supportive. The shoe’s ability to accommodate custom orthotics also resonated well with the purchasers. However, despite being marked as true to size and fit, there were complaints that it ran short and narrow. Other issues included poor construction and insoles. But in the end, the trainer came highly recommended because it was supportive and comfortable to wear.
pros: The Propet Connelly was described as one of the most comfortable walking shoes by almost all of the owners
A majority of wearers liked the rugged style of the trainer
Numerous people felt that their feet were properly supported while wearing this model
The available width options delighted many reviewers because they were able to find a snug and comfortable fit
The footgear was reasonably priced, according to plenty of consumers
Despite its bulky construction, a lot of individuals stated that it felt light on their feet
Several folks appreciated the removable insole because it allowed them to use custom orthotics
cons: Multiple shoppers complained about the Propet Connelly not being true to size and width
it was small in length and tight fitting even in the wide option
The trainer only lasted a few weeks, ranted a minority of users
the outsole wore out and seams unraveled
Some buyers did not like the insoles because they felt cheap, quickly lost their cushioning and had to be replaced

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Connelly Walking Shoes. They were about 10 years old and starting to show some wear so I figured it was time to replace them. The first ones were a lighter and had a thinner sole. These are built more like a hiking boot but still have the comfort and support of my older ones. I like the brown color so I can wear them to work with khakis. They do take a couple of days to break in but after that they feel even better.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Garrett

customer_reviews.title: He has a really hard time finding sneakers that are comfortable. He loves them
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my triple-D footed dad. He has a really hard time finding sneakers that are comfortable. He loves them! They look really sharp and he has worn them just about every day since. If you have wide feet (or are shopping for someone who does) - these are the sneaks for you!
customer_reviews.author: Baseball Fan

customer_reviews.title: Very Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the most comfortable shoes I have ever owned and the quality is outstanding. Needless to say I love them! I also own a pair of their winter shoes and love them too for their comfort and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Swafford

customer_reviews.title: Not extra depth as advertised
customer_reviews.text: They are OK shoes, decent quality, but its not extra depth like they claim. I removed the padding and added my own orthotics, but shoe sits my insoles high so the leather around the lacing holes really dig into the top of my feet, painfully like a standard shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Interesting shoe
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes in the middle of dealing with foot pain. They worked out really well. This was my second pair. My only complaint is the heal part has a piece of plastic that wears through the inner lining well before the rest of the show is worn out. Last about 6-7 months. Which for me is pretty typical even in the better known name-brand shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Too Narrow!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my husband but had to return them. The 5E is much narrower than a regular W from the same brand in a different style. On the positive side, the color is nice - the orange accents are surprisingly subtle.
customer_reviews.author: areifenb

customer_reviews.title: Well-made!
customer_reviews.text: The design and construction of these shoes is outstanding! They are a more like a cross between an athletic shoe and an ankle boot. From the online photo, I thought they were less supportive, than they are. The attention to detail is amazing, you won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Terrill

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Really like these shoes. They have great support feel really good and look great too. Walking on air with wonderful support
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn M. Cook

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable! Stylish!!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. Actual 5e, comfortable and they look good. Thank you Propet for a great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy R Hunt

customer_reviews.title: SMALL
customer_reviews.text: I have worn a size nine for 40 years these are maybe an eight but say nine. I like the look of the shoe but cant comment on the feel as they were way small, but return policy is in the words so I gave it a two instead of a one star.
customer_reviews.author: M. Q. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Too Tight For me
customer_reviews.text: I had to return these shoes, which I otherwise liked, as the fit was too tight. No problem with the return.
customer_reviews.author: Ken C.

customer_reviews.title: This company makes good shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Husband has purchased several Propet shoe styles now, and is loving the brand. He says all are high quality and feel WONDERFUL. Way to go, Propet!
customer_reviews.author: geogat

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband who has wide feet. Very hard to get right size for him but these worked out well and he now he doesn’t want to ever wear a different brand again!
customer_reviews.author: J. Powell

customer_reviews.title: Great Walking Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes! Was surprised with the great fit and comfort. Would recommend to anyone needing a good walking shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: My feet are grateful
customer_reviews.text: Propet is one of the few companies that makes good-looking shoes built for those of us with super-wide feet. And you can’t beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: JDTampa

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of shoes for the price, comfortable right out of the box. Wear to work for 9-10 hrs a day and for lunchtime walks of about 2 miles.
customer_reviews.author: Drahan

customer_reviews.title: Good walking shoe
customer_reviews.text: A comfortable walking shoes with needed support for my age.,(late 70's) Light weight and fit as I needed for a wide foot.
customer_reviews.author: james jorgensen

customer_reviews.title: The quality looked great on this shoe and I would have kept it ...
customer_reviews.text: The quality looked great on this shoe and I would have kept it except it was irratating my little toe on my left foot which was no fault of the manufacture. I would recommend this shoe to anyone but they also seem to run borderline small by 1/2 size.
customer_reviews.author: John Young

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: good comfort but ran a little large... but overall a good hiking shoe that cushions your feet well.
customer_reviews.author: Scott C. Barbu

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: My husband wore them when we doing some remodeling on our house and they wore out within 6 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: if he did not like them I would have heard
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my son. Has not complained about them, if he did not like them I would have heard. I thought they were very nice looking shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Pat D.

customer_reviews.title: I have a deformed right foot (Was crushed), the ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a deformed right foot (Was crushed), the 5E was just what I needed, not able to find in local stores
customer_reviews.author: Cobra

customer_reviews.title: Good fit, poor construction.
customer_reviews.text: Decent shoe for feel and fit. Construction is junk. Had this pair less than two weeks, and stitching on the toe is already broken. My last pair barely made it four months, but people with big feet don't have much choice. Brand quality has declined significantly over the last several years.
customer_reviews.author: K. Griffith

customer_reviews.title: great buy good price fit excellent
customer_reviews.text: great buy good price fit excellent. shopping in store for 15' sneaker never get any selection. more that happy with these sneakers
customer_reviews.author: S Holden

customer_reviews.title: Awesomesauce
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit me great . I have a hard time finding shoes because of the condition with my leg . I also love that it has removable soles . I probably will buy another pair just so I can have them for future use .
customer_reviews.author: Steven F. Zampella

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with past quality and durability. So I bought another pair!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Not good In wet weather
customer_reviews.text: Decent shoe but husband was disappointed, not waterproof at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it looks nice, and fits well
customer_reviews.text: it looks nice, and fits well, haven't used it so long to see whether it's durable or not, but it is quite comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Soheil

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes they are nice looking and very comfortable..
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to find good fitting wide shoes. These fit the bill.
customer_reviews.author: 科林

customer_reviews.title: Shoe hurts
customer_reviews.text: Wearing the shoe hurts the bottom of my foot and causes back pain
customer_reviews.author: eddie gill

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes I ever had
customer_reviews.text: Insert my own diabetic custom orthotics.These shoes give me the room I need to do that.Will keep purchasing more of these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Rober Zmitrewicz

customer_reviews.title: Shoe sole
customer_reviews.text: Where sole wrapped up toe of shoe is coming loose
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Clark

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoe and seems well constructed. Fits as expected
customer_reviews.author: Mark Haudenschild

customer_reviews.title: he is happy the way they fit
customer_reviews.text: My husband likes the shoes, he is happy the way they fit.
customer_reviews.author: labmom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Husband is very satisfied with the shoes. They have lasted for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Linda B.

customer_reviews.title: ... much support as I had expected but still a nice
customer_reviews.text: Not quite as much support as I had expected but still a nice shoe
customer_reviews.author: Knotjohn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great looking and very comfortable! Perfect shoe for people with very wide feet!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: great shoe but did not fit my wide set of toes,
customer_reviews.author: Jere Dando

customer_reviews.title: Runs small in length and width
customer_reviews.text: I ordered size 8 M (D) men's Propet Connelly Walking Shoe. This shoe runs small in length and width.. It's a nice looking walking shoe, but will be sending it back
customer_reviews.author: Jay Mey

customer_reviews.title: Too short, too narrow.
customer_reviews.text: No way that these were 10.5 5E, way to short and way to narrow. They seemed to of changed there last and now what use to fit, no longer does. Approach carefully, but thanks to Amazon that I am not having to pay to ship them back to the warehouse.
customer_reviews.author: MoBee

customer_reviews.title: I like 'em
customer_reviews.text: I can't speak for their longevity as I've only owned them for a couple of weeks, but these are pretty comfortable and I'm liking them thus far. I'd not heard of the brand before but decided to give these a shot as I was in need of some large, wide, non-dress shoes that I could wear with shorts.
customer_reviews.author: Rusty Shackleford

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is not 5E wide, it is about 3 or 4 E wide
customer_reviews.author: David J. Freitas

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: the size is not what it says and is much smaller
customer_reviews.author: Sheila l.

customer_reviews.title: How can a shoe company be so stupid as to claim both shoes are 13 5E when ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two different models of Propet shoes - the Connelly Walker and the Stability Walker - both in size 13 5E. The Connelly was way too short and too narrow; the Stability way too long and too wide. Neither was a true 13 5E. How can a shoe company be so stupid as to claim both shoes are 13 5E when the two models are completely different sizes! Returned both.
customer_reviews.author: Brian C. Grogan

product_meta.title: Propet M5503 Men's Connelly Shoe
product_meta.description: Leather and mesh upper with padded collar and tongue
feature_bullets: Antimicrobial Drilex lining to help prevent the leading causes of foot odor
EVA midsole with double footbed for flexible orthotic adoption. OrthoLite insole with memory foam top layer.
EVA and rubber outsole for cushion, traction and durable wear
